jobs.title: Customer Happiness Manager
jobs.description: Providing support to authors and creative professionals on the platform while optimizing conversion. Created new standards for tracking conversion and analyzing data from reviews and Net Promoter Scores.
jobs.takeaway: Listening & understanding | Strong written communication | Presentation | Problem-solving | Research | Dispute Resolution

jobs.title: Guest Relations Agent & Manager
jobs.description: Partenered with resort teams to ensure a positive guest experience while meeting sales goals and KPIs in Florida and the French Alps.
jobs.takeaway: Team management | Adaptable | Quick and effective under pressure | Empathetic | Collaboration | Creativity

jobs.title: Digital Media Manager
jobs.description: Oversaw the digital communication and social media accounts for top resorts in Florida, Mexico and Guadelope. Transitioned resorts to an information and promotional resort television channel.
jobs.takeaway: Storytelling | Aesthetic presentation | Resourcefulness | Technical aptitude | Self-directed
